description:
there is camel-style issue havn't been clean in limits v3 api. 

in file nova/api/openstack/compute/plugins/v3/used_limits.py and nova/api/openstack/compute/views/limits.py there is camel-style code used by limits v3 api.
title: camel-style issue in limites v3 api

comments.content:

comments.content: Used limits will be removed in icehouse as will most if not of all of limits (there are a couple of changesets already in the queue doing this).
